evidence.text: 1 | 2018-10-15 | Complaint. Filing fee in the amount of $400 collected. Agency Tracking ID: 0979-5594026 Jury Trial Requested: No. Filed by Debra Blake against City of Grants Pass (Attachments: # 1 Civil Cover Sheet, # 2 Proposed Summons). (Johnson, Edward) (Entered: 10/15/2018)

extracted.value: Debra Blake filed a Complaint against City of Grants Pass on October 15, 2018, seeking injunctive and declaratory relief. The filing included a Civil Cover Sheet and Proposed Summons.

evidence.text: 25 | 2019-03-13 | Motion to Certify the Class . Oral Argument requested. Filed by All Plaintiffs. (Johnson, Edward) (Entered: 03/13/2019)

extracted.value: All Plaintiffs filed a Motion to Certify the Class on March 13, 2019, requesting class certification with supporting declarations from Debra Blake, Gloria Johnson, John Logan, Kelly Wessels, Teresa Santucci, and Ed Johnson.

evidence.text: 62 | 2020-01-17 | Motion for Summary Judgment . Oral Argument requested. Filed by All Plaintiffs. (Attachments: # 1 Appendix A) (Johnson, Edward) (Entered: 01/17/2020)

extracted.value: All Plaintiffs filed a Motion for Summary Judgment on January 17, 2020, requesting summary judgment in their favor with supporting declarations from Edward Johnson, Inessa Wurscher, Kelly Wessels, and multiple other plaintiffs.

evidence.text: 80 | 2020-02-28 | Joint Motion for Summary Judgment and RESPONSE TO PLTFS' SUMMARY JUDGMENT. Filed by City of Grants Pass. (Hisel, Aaron) (Entered: 02/28/2020)

extracted.value: City of Grants Pass filed a Joint Motion for Summary Judgment and Response to Plaintiffs' Summary Judgment on February 28, 2020, opposing the plaintiffs' motion with declarations from Aaron Hisel, Terri McClure, Jim Hamilton, and Jason McGinnis.

evidence.text: 88 | 2020-03-27 | Reply Brief on Plaintiffs' Motion for Summary Judgment and Response to Joint Motion for Summary Judgment and RESPONSE TO PLTFS' SUMMARY JUDGMENT 80 Oral Argument requested. Filed by All Plaintiffs. (Johnson, Edward) (Entered: 03/27/2020)

extracted.value: All Plaintiffs filed a Reply Brief on Plaintiffs' Motion for Summary Judgment on March 27, 2020, supporting their motion with declarations from Kelly Wessels, Debra Blake, Gloria Johnson, and Edward Johnson.

evidence.text: 19 | 2019-02-28 | First Amended Complaint . Filed by Debra Blake against All Plaintiffs. (Fonseca, Walter) (Entered: 02/28/2019)

extracted.value: Debra Blake filed a First Amended Complaint on February 28, 2019, expanding the claims against City of Grants Pass with additional plaintiffs.

evidence.text: 23 | 2019-03-08 | Second Amended Complaint . Filed by John Logan, Debra Blake, Gloria Johnson against All Defendants. (Fonseca, Walter) (Entered: 03/08/2019)

extracted.value: John Logan, Debra Blake, and Gloria Johnson filed a Second Amended Complaint on March 8, 2019, adding new plaintiffs and claims against City of Grants Pass.

evidence.text: 50 | 2019-11-13 | Third Amended Complaint . Filed by John Logan, Debra Blake, Gloria Johnson against All Defendants. (Johnson, Edward) (Entered: 11/13/2019)

extracted.value: John Logan, Debra Blake, and Gloria Johnson filed a Third Amended Complaint on November 13, 2019, further amending their claims against City of Grants Pass.
